yacl3.config.systemsapi.title: SystemsAPI
yacl3.config.systemsapi.category.importe: The base delay in milliseconds between navigation clicks.
If, the importer is getting things wrong, you should increase this.
These values represent the time in milliseconds that the importer will wait for an expected event to occur before throwing an error.
If you have poor ping and are timing out frequently, you may want to increase these values.
The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait for a menu to open before throwing an error.
The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait for a menu to fully load before throwing an error.
The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait to receive an item before throwing an error.
The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait to receive a previous input throwing an error.
